data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Pastel has an unique character. It is not only about Scalable
    Vector Graphics but about graphics in general. It has sophisticated
    support for computational geometry and animation and API closely
    follows Java Graphics2D API. In future it will also support PDF
    generation.

    There are several modules in the package and it is imperative that
    I "use Pastel".
